testCases.explanation: One valid order is [0,1,2,3]; [0,2,1,3] is also valid.
Only one course with no prerequisites.
Cycle detected: course 0 requires 1 and course 1 requires 0.

description:
Solve the **Course Schedule II** problem.

There are numCourses courses labeled 0 to numCourses-1. prerequisites[i] = [a, b] means course b must be taken before course a. Return a valid ordering of courses to finish all of them. Return an empty array if it is impossible.

See the full problem description on [LeetCode](https://leetcode.com/problems/course-schedule-ii/).
